thread.section_title: The Nadler Soho - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Family visit to London
thread.title_full: Family visit to London - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel S
title: Family visit to London
text:
The hotel is beautifully presented and very impressive upon arrival. The room we had was spacious and well stocked. We had an unfortunate experience with the beds when our request for 2 single beds for our sons was misinterpreted which took the shine off things a bit. The location is perfect for visiting Soho and the theatres in the area.
Room Tip: If you need something specific, make sure you confirm this at every stage. See more room tips
